resources.string:
Load

Description

Load a image from your device and use it as background. The image is automatically scaled and rotated to fit your canvas for the best. Your previous canvas is completely erased.

Share

Description

Save your canvas in a PNG image and allow you to share it with an other application from your device.

Save

Description

Save your canvas in a PNG image with a randomly chosen name.

Clear

Description

Clear your canvas. The background color will be the secondary color (see Colors). You can not undo a clear operation.

Pan and zoom

Description

Allow you to pan the canvas with one finger or zoom with two. To quit the pan and zoom, click on a icon of the Action Bar (top bar) or the bottom bar, even the pan and zoom icon.

Reset view

Description

Reset the scale and the position of the canvas (see Pan and zoom).

Undo

Description

Cancel the last stroke. You can undo up to 5 strokes by default. You can increase or decrease this number in the extra settings. If you change this number, it will be effective after your next stroke.

Hide/Show User Interface

Description

Click on the logo to remove the user interface. The logo will still show up semi-transparent. Click again to get back the user interface.

Settings

Description

Display a user interface to parameterize the current brush.

Extra settings

Description

Display a user interface to parameterize the number of possible undos and the kaleidoscope.
